sentences.en: For all the forced badinage, it was an awkward meal.
sentences.cn: 大家尽管勉强地说说笑笑, 这顿饭依旧吃得很别扭.

sentences.en: They bellowed pleasedly at the badinage.
sentences.cn: 他们还以为思嘉在开玩笑,都乐得大叫起来.

sentences.en: When he reached the gate, there was the usual badinage with Charlie.
sentences.cn: 当他来到公园大门时, 还是与往常一样和查理开玩笑.

trans.tran_en: Badinage is humorous or light-hearted conversation that often involves teasing someone
